overview:
Conditional tags are used to check for truthyness/falsyness
values. They are similar to section, but don't iterate. Also, an
else case can be specified.

When and Unless tags SHOULD be treated as standalone when
appropriate.

tests.name: Truthy When
tests.desc: Truthy Whens should have their contents rendered.

tests.name: Falsy When
tests.desc: Falsy Whens should not have their contents rendered.

tests.name: Falsy Unless
tests.desc: Falsy Unless should have their contents rendered.

tests.name: Truthy Unless
tests.desc: Truthy Unless should not have their contents rendered.

tests.name: When Unless aka If Then Else
tests.desc: When and Unless can be chained

tests.name: When Unless aka If Then Else with Falsy value
tests.desc: When and Unless can be chained

tests.name: When Unless aka If Then Else can be inverted
tests.desc: When and Unless can be inverted

tests.name: Surrounding Whitespace
tests.desc: Whens should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Internal Whitespace
tests.desc: Whens should not alter internal whitespace.

tests.name: Indented Inline Sections
tests.desc: Single-line Whens should not alter surrounding whitespace.

tests.name: Standalone Lines
tests.desc: Standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.desc: Indented standalone lines should be removed from the template.

tests.name: Standalone Line Endings
